problems.title: Find Maximum in Array
problems.description: Read an array of N integers and print the largest element found in the array.

starter_codes.python:
n = int(input())
arr = list(map(int, input().split()))
print(max(arr))

problems.title: Array Sum
problems.description: Calculate the sum of all elements in an integer array of size N.
problems.explanation: Declare an array of size N, then use a loop to read N elements. Initialize a `sum` variable to 0 and add each element to it within the loop.

starter_codes.python:
n = int(input())
arr = list(map(int, input().split()))
print(sum(arr))

problems.title: Reverse Array
problems.description: Read an array of size N and print its elements in reverse order.
problems.explanation: Read the array elements first. Then, use a loop starting from the last index (`N-1`) down to 0 and print each element.

starter_codes.python:
n = int(input())
arr = list(map(int, input().split()))
print(*(arr[::-1]))

problems.title: Linear Search
problems.description: Read an array of size N and an integer X. Output the index of X if found, else -1.
problems.explanation: Iterate through the array and compare each element with X. If a match is found, print the index and exit. If the loop finishes without a match, print -1.

starter_codes.python:
n = int(input())
arr = list(map(int, input().split()))
x = int(input())
try:
    print(arr.index(x))
except ValueError:
    print(-1)
